title: Mythical Beast Sanctuary Adventure #75
goal: Solve the puzzles, achieve the main objective, and escape.

rooms.name: Keeper's Lodge
rooms.description: A cozy wooden lodge filled with the scent of herbs and hay. Maps of the sanctuary cover the walls, showing enclosures for various mythical creatures. A large desk sits near the fireplace, and shelves hold books about beast care. Through the window, you can see the silhouettes of magnificent creatures in the distance.

items.name: keeper's desk
items.description: A sturdy oak desk covered with feeding schedules and care instructions for the sanctuary's creatures

items.name: creature feeding schedule
items.description: A detailed chart showing when each creature eats
items.text: FEEDING TIMES: Phoenix - 3:00 AM (3rd hour), Unicorn - 12:00 PM (12th hour), Griffin - 1:00 AM (1st hour). Remember: The combination is the order they were discovered - Phoenix first, then Unicorn, then Griffin.

items.name: brass enclosure key
items.description: A key with a griffin emblem engraved on it

items.name: creature lore bookshelf
items.description: Tall shelves filled with ancient texts about mythical beasts

items.name: encyclopedia of mythical beasts
items.description: A leather-bound tome with detailed entries about sanctuary creatures
items.text: SANCTUARY RECORDS: Head Keeper is Master Aldric Thornwood. The rarest creature is the Phoenix, which nests in the Sacred Grove. All keepers must know: What do phoenixes rise from? Where do unicorns dwell? Who leads this sanctuary?

items.name: supply cabinet
items.description: A locked cabinet containing important sanctuary supplies

items.name: keeper's journal
items.description: A personal journal belonging to the head keeper
items.text: Journal Entry: Master Aldric Thornwood here. The unicorns prefer the Moonlit Meadow above all places. I've hidden the Sacred Grove key in the enclosures. Only those who truly understand our creatures may enter the grove where the phoenix nests.

items.name: heavy wooden door
items.description: A reinforced door leading to the beast enclosures

rooms.name: Beast Enclosures
rooms.description: A vast open area with multiple enclosures housing magnificent mythical creatures. A majestic unicorn grazes in one pen, its horn glowing softly. In another, a griffin preens its golden feathers. The air is filled with magical energy and the sounds of extraordinary beasts. Stone markers provide information about each creature.

items.name: unicorn information marker
items.description: A stone plaque describing the unicorn
items.text: UNICORN: A pure white horse with a spiraling horn. Habitat: Moonlit Meadow. Diet: Enchanted flowers and moonbeams. Known for healing powers and grace.

items.name: griffin information marker
items.description: A carved stone describing the griffin
items.text: GRIFFIN: Half eagle, half lion. Habitat: Mountain Peaks. Diet: Blessed meat. Guardian creature known for loyalty and strength.

items.name: phoenix information marker
items.description: An ornate plaque about the phoenix
items.text: PHOENIX: A magnificent bird of flame. Habitat: Sacred Grove. Diet: Cinnamon and myrrh. Rises from ashes to be reborn. The rarest creature in our sanctuary.

items.name: feed storage chest
items.description: A large chest containing various types of creature food

items.name: silver grove key
items.description: An ornate silver key with phoenix feathers attached

items.name: enchanted water trough
items.description: A stone trough filled with shimmering magical water

items.name: Sacred Grove gate
items.description: An elaborate gate covered in mystical runes. A stone tablet beside it poses three questions that only a true keeper could answer.

password_questions.question: Where do unicorns dwell?
password_questions.hint: Read the unicorn marker and the keeper's journal

password_questions.question: Who leads this sanctuary?
password_questions.hint: The beast encyclopedia and keeper's journal mention the head keeper

rooms.name: Sacred Grove
rooms.description: You have entered the most sacred place in the sanctuary! A magnificent phoenix perches on a golden nest in the center of a clearing surrounded by ancient trees. The bird's feathers shimmer with flames of red, gold, and orange. As you approach, the phoenix spreads its wings and sings a beautiful melody. A shimmering portal of light appears behind the nest, offering passage to freedom.

items.name: golden phoenix nest
items.description: A nest woven from golden branches and lined with cinnamon bark, where the phoenix rests

items.name: magnificent phoenix
items.description: The legendary phoenix, a bird of living flame with eyes like molten gold

items.name: ancient grove trees
items.description: Trees that have stood for thousands of years, their bark covered in glowing runes
items.text: The runes tell the story of the sanctuary: 'Here the mythical beasts find refuge. Here they are protected and cherished. Those who prove themselves worthy may pass through the phoenix's portal to freedom.'

rooms.win_message: The phoenix acknowledges your worthiness! It spreads its magnificent wings and the portal behind it blazes with brilliant light. You have proven yourself a true keeper of mythical beasts. As you step through the portal, the phoenix's song follows you, a blessing for your journey. You have successfully completed your sanctuary adventure and earned your freedom! You win!
